page.title: 06GOODLEIGH ART CENTRE
page.content: The teacher runs art classes.On Tuesday nights at 7.30pm till 9.30pm he does drawing classes.Then at the same time on a Wednesday he does a sculpture class.Thursday is painting and drawing from 7.30pm till 9.30pm.Then on a Saturday morning he does a children's class with a mix of drawing painting and sculpture from 10.00am till 12.00pm.Once a term he does a class for some of Chelfam school of sculpture from 7.30pm till 9.30pm.The art centre has been running for over a year now and he has three exibitions per year.Two of sculpture models and another of the children's work.
